channel.title: Snippets Section Petition
channel.description:
[center][u][b][size=12pt]ATTENTION MOPARIANS:[/size][/b][/u][/center] [center]This suggestion has been Posted multiple times, Has been showed much support, Yet everytime , Ends up being Denied. Why is this? I Will tell you why. We need to draw Attention to the fact that this isn't just some idea, It's a matter of Some Importance. Weather you Agree or Disagree with the Idea of Having a Seperate section Only for Snippets, Please Elaborate on the REASONS You feel such a way.[/center]
If you Disagree, Post your thoughts and Reasoning about WHY you Disagree, Instead of just replying with "Dumb Idea", Or some other statement of that sort.
If you AGREE With this topic, Post YOUR thoughts and Reasoning as to why you agree. In my opinion, the reason other topics on this matter have been denied, Is because no one has given enough Reasoning from both stand points to make an Educated Decision. [center]______________________________________________________________________________________ ||[b]PROS[/b]----------------------------||------------VS-----------||---------------------------[b]CONS[/b]|| ||---------------------------------||------------- ------------||--------------------------------|| ||=========================================================================|| ||_____________________________||______________________||____________________________|| ||_____________________________||______________________||____________________________|| ||_____________________________||______________________||____________________________|| ||_____________________________||______________________||____________________________|| ||_____________________________||______________________||____________________________||[/center]
Hello there Moparscape, As you all know, At the moment there is no Board dedicated soloely to Snippets. Now, this may not seem like a huge deal, But it's definitely annoying. Why not make things Simpler by just creating a Simple Board to house all these Pieces of code under one section, Where a user can Easily Browse through all the posts and topics without having to scroll through 80 pages of a single thread.
Aren't you tired of Posting your snippets in a SINGLE thread? Are you tired of Going through 50, 60, even 70+ pages to find a piece of code your looking for?
I am.
So I'm starting this petition to add a Snippets section to the MoparScape Boards. If you would like to eSign this Petition, Simply Reply with "I Support" And I will add your name to the List :)
[u][b]NOTICE:[/b][/u] To REALLY get this thread Recognized and Seen by Moparisthebest, As Davidi2 has suggested, Please post below with reasons you Believe a snippet section would be useful and would Help our community. If you truly believe that Mopar would do better with a Snippets Section, Post with your support and all the wonderful reasons this would be an Excellent addition to the Moparscape Community!
[u][b]I Will start off with some Reasons as to why this would Be a good Idea.[/b][/u]
[ul][li]The useful work of our Members would be more widely seen and used by the community[/li] [li]Members may be more inspired to Contribute to the Community with their own bits of code, Knowing that they Will have an entire topic to themselves for anyone to see, as opposed to getting 10-15 fews on page 128636453 of a single thread.[/li] [li]This will help New members of our Community by providing a Topic Specific board.[/li] [li]This Idea has been requested before and has been showed support by the Community.[/li] [li]How many Good Tutorial posts have been shut down due to the *lack of explanation*[/li] [li]Moparscape Looks down upon spoonfeeding, So why not Make this section for Users who want to contribute their Ideas and Code, Without simply Instructing someone step-by-step How to do it.[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Current Support List:[/b][/u] Eclipse639 Uncalled Team_Rocket arham 4 Fridder tinyscape Stupit lostmyphat AtomicInt_ drubrkletern pk2play

item.title: Snippets Section Petition
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Waiting for a valid reason for this to be added…

Read full topic

item.title: Snippets Section Petition
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:31, topic:426677”]Personally I do think it’s a good idea. I fully support a pastebin instead, but I know that would never get done. A subsection would be much faster and less effort for an administrator.

This would also allow us to just move threads instead of locking them if they were snippets, and like you guys have pointed out, it does make them easier to find.

I could even use my list generator to make a snippets list like the tutorials and downloads haha :P[/quote]
Which you update every once in a blue moon. <3

I support, but I don’t think it is THAT necessary. You can also use the search bar to just search through a thread… Also not like another subsection will cause any harm to the forums or anything. Will probably get more activity than the client help section.

Read full topic

[/quote]I here birth control helps with the monthly stuff.[/quote]

item.title: Snippets Section Petition
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

didn’t read the whole thread, so i suggest why not just add a sub-section like general disc -> questions? right now it’s just a thread waiting to be optimized.

pros:

tutorials will be separated from the snippets – in a more distinct manner.
rather than looking through countless thread pages, the search bar can be your friend while looking for a specific snippet.

cons:

most if not all of the snippets in the snippet thread will be deleted.

that’s all i feel like contributing. i support.

Read full topic

[/quote]

but people would rather go through it to see what they can find to leechify their server up some more!!

And isn’t that what moparscape is about?[/quote]Well I love to leech and compile everything into my Client.jaba as much as the next guy, but still D:

item.title: Snippets Section Petition
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Personally I do think it’s a good idea. I fully support a pastebin instead, but I know that would never get done. A subsection would be much faster and less effort for an administrator.

This would also allow us to just move threads instead of locking them if they were snippets, and like you guys have pointed out, it does make them easier to find.

I could even use my list generator to make a snippets list like the tutorials and downloads haha

Read full topic
